Small-time pool hustler "Fast Eddie" Felson longs to break into
the major league of professional hustling and the high-rollers'
high-stakes wagering that follows it. He throws his raw talent
and ambition up against the best player in the country; seeking
to best the legendary pool player Minnesota Fats.
